line.comment: * Returns 2 if a new coalition has been formed or if $race has joined an existing one, 1 if $race has been added to the list of potential allies, null if the operation failed.
* We determine the status based on the number of potential allies.
* $status: 1 means that the faction WANTS to form a coalition, 2 means that the coalitions already exists.
* We create the coalition if more than 1 faction want it.
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasUnbreakableAlliance' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$ally
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasTotalWar' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$ally

line.text: 's have formed a new coalition against the '

line.comment: * do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasTotalWar' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$a

line.text: 's have joined the coalition against the '

line.comment: * We remove all enemies against whom we previously wanted a coalition.
* Make sure everyone is hostile to the enemy.
* Make sure coalition members have no truce against the enemy.
* Make sure everyone is friendly in the coalition.
* Zero Hour: also suppress total war

sval.val: The
s and the
s have formed a new coalition against the
The
s have joined the coalition against the
Returns 2 if a new coalition has been formed or if $race has joined an existing one, 1 if $race has been added to the list of potential allies, null if the operation failed.
We determine the status based on the number of potential allies.
$status: 1 means that the faction WANTS to form a coalition, 2 means that the coalitions already exists.
We create the coalition if more than 1 faction want it.
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasUnbreakableAlliance' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$ally
return null
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasTotalWar' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$ally
return null
The coalition already exists.
for each $a in array $allies
do if $a == $race
*do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasUnbreakableAlliance' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$a
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasTotalWar' : raceOrObject1=$race raceOrObject2=$a
$ally = $a
skip if $ally
return null
We remove all enemies against whom we previously wanted a coalition.
Make sure everyone is hostile to the enemy.
Make sure coalition members have no truce against the enemy.
Make sure everyone is friendly in the coalition.
Zero Hour: also suppress total war
skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.HasTotalWar' : raceOrObject1=$coalitionAlly raceOrObject2=$ally
